price: 47. Dan sesungguhnya bagi orang-orang yang zalim masih ada azab selain itu. Tetapi kebanyakan mereka tidak mengetahui.*(816)
arabic: وَإِنَّ لِلَّذِينَ ظَلَمُواْ عَذَابٗا دُونَ ذَٰلِكَ وَلَٰكِنَّ أَكۡثَرَهُمۡ لَا يَعۡلَمُونَ
footnotes: *816). Adanya musim kemarau, kelaparan, malapetaka yang menimpa mereka, azab kubur, dan lain-lain.

version.title: Indonesian Translation - Sabeq Company
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by Sabeq Company, printed in 2016. corrected by Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: wa-inna lilladhīna ẓalamū ʿadhāban dūna dhālika walākinna aktharahum lā yaʿlamūna
